mapper.insert: INSERT INTO admins (id, tenant_id, username, password, full_name, email, phone, avatar, created_at) VALUES (#{id}, #{tenantId}, #{username}, #{password}, #{fullName}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{avatar}, #{createdAt})
mapper.delete: UPDATE admins SET deleted_at = UNIX_TIMESTAMP(now(3)) * 1000 WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted_at = 0
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM admins WHERE id = #{id} LIMIT 1

where.if: AND (username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keywords}, '%') OR full_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keywords}, '%') OR email LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keywords}, '%') OR phone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keywords}, '%'))
